wariomod:TheHat.NAME: The Hat
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a card into your hand that #yRetains and #yMoves up to #b3 Spaces.

wariomod:DoomHat.NAME: Doom Hat
wariomod:DoomHat.FLAVOR: I will incinerate your soul and imprison your mind in eons of pain. Also, your hair smells nice.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL At the start of combat, Transform #b4 random Empty Spaces into #yDoom #ySpaces.

wariomod:SuperHat.NAME: Super Hat
wariomod:SuperHat.FLAVOR: Faster than a speeding regular hat.
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL At the start of combat, add a card into your hand that #yRetains and #yMoves any number of Spaces.

wariomod:SmileyHat.NAME: Smiley Hat
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, Transform a random Empty Space into a positive Space.

wariomod:AngryHat.NAME: Angry Hat
wariomod:AngryHat.FLAVOR: ARRRRRGH, this conflict is coming to a head.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, Transform a random negative Space into an Empty Space.

wariomod:PropellerHat.NAME: Propeller Hat
wariomod:PropellerHat.FLAVOR: get it, like u r flying
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate the first positive Space you pass each turn.

wariomod:SunglassHat.NAME: Sunglasses Hat
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time a rare Space would fade each combat, prevent it.
